configitem.name: app.docs_root
configitem.comments: This is used to retrieve requested documents

configitem.name: app.verbal
configitem.comments: Write diagnostic messages to the standard I/O device

configitem.name: app.httpd_prefix
configitem.comments: Prefix for all disk file requests

configitem.name: app.httpd_name
configitem.comments: Application name from the client calls

configitem.name: app.title
configitem.comments: Application title as it appears in the all windows

configitem.name: app.dynamicTemplates
configitem.comments: When this option is 0 the templates are cached in memory. Otherwise they are not cached which is very slow but allowes to change templates without reloding the server

configitem.name: app.id
configitem.comments: Application ID is used to identify the server to the launch shell

configitem.name: app.automap_reload
configitem.comments: Automatically reload the map.conf file each time a document is requested

configitem.name: app.security_enabled
configitem.comments: Flag that indicates that this application runs under SSL. Possible value: 1 - use SSL. 0 - use plain HTTP

configitem.name: app.fixup_static_url
configitem.comments: Fix up the URL to the binary resourece. This is useful when application is setup under Tomcat server and the servlet access control is turned on

configitem.name: error.printFailure
configitem.value: A failure occurred while attempting to create print output

configitem.name: pdom.cache
configitem.comments: cache - Set cachesize for PDOM engine (in pages of 128 DOM nodes) The cache is shared by all open documents Values: Integers between 20 and MAXINT (given you have that much memory) Default: 100

configitem.name: html.login_logo
configitem.comments: Filename of the login page image. html.login_logo=mhtlogin1_preview.gif

configitem.name: html.select_logo
configitem.comments: Filename of the select page image. html.select_logo=mhtlogin2_preview.gif

configitem.name: html.btnbar_logo
configitem.comments: Filename of the button bar image. html.btnbar_logo=mhtlogo_preview.gif

configitem.name: ietm.cgm_control
configitem.comments: Set the CGM control used by IETM to support CGM files. The supported values 1, 2 and 3. Default 1. 1 - Active CGM Control from Corel 2 - IsoView Control from ITEDO 3 - VizEx Control from Larson CGM

configitem.name: ietm.iso_view_release
configitem.comments: Set the CGM control used by IETM to support CGM files. In case when Iso View is setup as CGM graphics controls this setting tells the application to reset the engine each time the graphics window is closed. Defaults is 0. 1 - Reset the engine each time 0 - Do nothing

configitem.name: ietm.about_url
configitem.comments: Location of the about this IETM file

configitem.name: ietm.company_url
configitem.comments: Company URL available from the help menu

configitem.name: ietm.disable_wcn
configitem.comments: Disables pop-up windows for warnings, cautions and notes if 0 - popups are enabled if 1 - popups are disabled

configitem.name: ietm.sw_version
configitem.comments: IETM Software version used for TPDR dialog

configitem.name: ietm.smrcode
configitem.comments: name of file containing SMR codes

configitem.name: ietm.disable_anonymous_login
configitem.comments: Disable/Enable anonymous login. Possible values 0/1. Default value 0 (login enabled)

configitem.name: ietm.enable_exact_phrase
configitem.comments: Enable exact phrase filtering for full-text. Possible values 0/1. Default value 0

configitem.name: ietm.include_fragments
configitem.comments: Enable text fragments for full-text search. Possible values 0/1. Default value 0

configitem.name: ietm.search_max_num
configitem.comments: Optional max num of hits to display for full-text searches

configitem.name: ietm.search_max_num_opt
configitem.comments: Optional max num of hits to display for categorical searches

configitem.name: ietm.toc_transform
configitem.comments: Turns on the server side TOC transformation

configitem.name: ietm.toc_transform_params
configitem.comments: List of parameters for server-side TOC transformation

configitem.name: send_compressed_content
configitem.comment: by defaults the file content will be sent out as it is. If this value is set to 1 it will be compressed before sending out

configitem.name: need_compress_content_file_type
configitem.comment: list of the file extensions need to be compressed, like 'svg,txt,xml,doc'

configitem.name: pdf.page_x_position
configitem.comments: Page label position along X. This entry controls the horizontal position of the label Page NN of NN

configitem.name: pdf.page_y_position
configitem.comments: Page label position along Y This entry controls the vertical position of the label Page NN of NN

configitem.name: pdf.label_y_position
configitem.comments: Graphics label position along Y. Vertical position of the title for an image

configitem.name: pdf.label_y_position
configitem.comments: Graphics extend Y. Vertical extend of the image on the page

configitem.name: pdf.param_list
configitem.comments: This section defines the variables which can be used in the Headers/fotters. The name defines the parameter name in the template_pdf.xsl The value will be passed by the application. See the template_pdf.xsl for an example how to use those variables List of the parameters available for headers/footers

configitem.name: pub_number.name
configitem.comments: This variable only defines the name which will be used in the template_pdf.xsl style. The values are found in the book section see DEFAULT.BIKE.pub_version.value for example

configitem.name: pub_date.name
configitem.comments: This variable only defines the name which will be used in the template_pdf.xsl style. The values are found in the book section see DEFAULT.BIKE.pub_date.value for example

configitem.name: help.show_help
configitem.comments: Show the help button in the application
